name.ja: ヴォルカニック・エミッション

text.en:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● Take 1 "Volcanic" monster from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it, ignoring its Summoning conditions, but return it to the hand during the End Phase.
● Target 1 Pyro monster on the field; inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK. If you targeted a monster you control, the damage inflicted by this effect is halved.
You can only use each effect of "Volcanic Emission" once per turn.
